column4: hey, while upgrading to 7.10 I get this error: "Failed to fetch http://falcon.landure.fr/dists/feisty/Release Unable to find expected entry  pidgin/binary-amd64/Packages in Meta-index file (malformed Release file?)" what should I do?

hey, while upgrading to 7.10 I get this error: "Failed to fetch http://falcon.landure.fr/dists/feisty/Release Unable to find expected entry  pidgin/binary-amd64/Packages in Meta-index file (malformed Release file?)" what should I do?
Remove that entry from System>Administraion>Software Sources.
Its a third party repo that probably doesnt have gutsy packages.
